I'm so happy for both of you!! I'm currently in a year's long process of tapering off of all rx meds. 20 years of improper and overmedicating has stolen that time from me. I plan to only use Mmj for pain and anxiety in place of all meds as soon as I'm done with this process. I'm glad your husband didn't take those pills. He would have had to recover from those after beating cancer. Again, good for both of you xoxo

And """"nothing wrong""""? They supported the boys going on this trip, they supported their licenses and going out on their own. No beacon, no adult on the open water. Would you allow two 14 year old kids to drive from Miami to Tallahassee alone? But that's right, I forgot. If they were to break down driving there would be people nearby. I'm guessing you don't have kids or have never been around 14 year old kids, otherwise you would know how ignorant and blind are your comments. I was referring to the insanely large amount of individuals killed by police, Regardless of what happened with Michael Brown. We have an epidemic of unjustified police shootings and killings in this country. A level unacceptable to any other modern Western country. It's mainly due to police being taught an us vs them mentality, in contrast to policing in other countries where they are servants and protectors of society.
